entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • _LinkNativeExecutable target fails running net6.0-ios for simulator and device with native reference, works with older Xamarin.iOS #62410
  • [API Proposal]: Implicitely convert IEnumerable to ImmutableArray (and friends) #62409
  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableCollection AddOrReplace #62408
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonConverter with simple string to type serialization #62406
  • Regression: Aborted (core dumped) when running .NET 6.0 app in Docker on linux-arm host #62402
  • [API Proposal]: DrawRectangle should accept RectangleF as one of the overloads #62401
  • .NET built on Fedora 36 crashes while initializing LTTng #62398
  • Question about Assembly loading & Resolving #62391
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 MAUI, validation-runtime-.NET 6 MAUI #runtime-119866-.NET6MAUI #62388
  • Segmentation Fault #62387
  • SocketAsyncEventArgs System.StackOverflowException #62386
  • 3 `System.Net.Sockets.Tests`failing on `Libraries Test Run release coreclr windows x64 Debug` #62384

Closed

  • Test failure: JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/Arm/ArmBase/Yield_r* on Arm64 #62117
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsSIMD(arg) || (info->GetStackSlotsNumber() == 1)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' (IL size 105) #62249
    7.0.0
  • WebAssembly <NativeFileReference> isn't included in VS's fast up-to-date check #60862
  • Win Svr 2022 exception System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord #62383
  • No SerializeAsync in System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer #61221

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AggressiveInlining for Char.IsLatin1 #62405
  • [release/6.0] Fix re-initialization of hash objects on CNG. #62403
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][wasm] Fix an issue with the passing of small vtypes. #62400
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [arm64] JIT: X % 2 == 0 -> X & 1 == 0 #62399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Directory.Delete: prefer DirectoryNotFoundException over UnauthorizedAccess IOException. #62396
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] benchmark sample modularized #62395
    area-Infrastructure-mono, needs-author-action
  • JIT: handle more cases for MOD/DIV -> UMOD/UDIV transformation #62394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Set iframe's referrerPolicy #62390
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Debugger tests #62389
    NO REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Ensure that FMA codegen operand swapping matches the lsra selections #62382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor arm64 epilog generation #62381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[mono][wasm] Fix the passing/returning of small vtypes. (#622… #62380
    * NO MERGE *, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix Some Date and Time parsing cases #62376
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Fixes an issue with FeatureSIMD=0 and ArmBase.Yield #62351
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change assert in NewPutArg(), so it is consistent with transformation done by fgMorphArgs() #62379
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make copynative use nested msbuild out-of-proc executions #62404
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix re-initialization of hash objects on CNG. #62397
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add regex test for parsing runtime-assets expressions #62344
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove explicit Exe output types from tests without Main #62361
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Small fix for Crossgen2 execution on Windows #62358
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Build improvements, and fixes #61581
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: three fixes for OSR #62367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Spans on Go() methods for Code Gen engines #62324
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Revert (#62339) to unblock CI #62371
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Convert some old style intrinsics to NamedIntrinsic #62271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [Android] Prevent potential out of bounds write on Android #62275
    area-System.Security
  • Ensure all types are loaded when methods are accessed as function pointers #62158
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Re-enable windows wasm AOT tests #62352
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62278
    area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • API proposal implementation: DirectoryInfo.Copy / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Convert System.DirectoryServices.Protocols and System.Drawing.Common to use GeneratedDllImport #62365
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62348
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • I can't create a project with dotnet cli #22846
  • Provide a way to turn off Diagnostic Tracing in projects #11530
    Backlog
  • [Package Validation] We should support excluding tfms when running the validation #22901

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0063 "using statement can be simplified" code fix results in invalid code (build error) #58113
  • Provide access to semantic model during filtering phase of incremental source generator #58112

Closed

  • Invalid parsing of interpolated strings with curly braces followed after interpolation with format specifier #57750
    17.1
  • List-patterns: lowering assumes the conversion from int to Index will use the implicit conversion operator #57825
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58115
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `ldlen` to get array's Length during pattern-matching. #58114
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns, 17.1

Merged

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58067
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add scripts to verify if a branch is ready to review #58110
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Factor nullability logic for placeholders #58036
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix placement of trivia inside an interpolation #57989
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Standardize list pattern lowering on `Index` constructor. #58055
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Fix removal and addition of analyzer in same batch #58024
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58111
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58118
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58117
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Lazy load ISourceLinkService to reduce DLL loads #58108
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Implement Naming Styles for editorconfig UI #58075
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Revert SourceLink PRs #58109
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor server InputFile not properly handling exceptions #38824
  • Perf improvement: single_query #38823
  • Blazor: Refreshing page throws error when using JavaScript modules #38822
  • Html.DisplayFor should render Uri as hyperlink #38821
  • Helix InstallLocalDb sometimes hangs on windows.11 queue #38819

Closed

  • Why TryUpdateModel cannot bind data to ModelState? #27305
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #38773
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_ef #38803
  • FileLoggerProcessorTests.RollsTextFiles #34284
    Test failures
  • RazorPagesTemplate_IdentityWeb_BuildsAndPublishes template test flakiness #31729
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Http2ConnectionTests.ResponseTrailers_MultipleStreams_Reset test failure #37930
    7.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • ModelMetadata doc: How to set Placeholder #38820
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • chore - Use `HttpMethods` #38466
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine tests / skip mslocaldb helix tests #38814
    7.0-preview1

Updated

  • LdapAdapter: Keep track of already processed groups to account for circular references #38817
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Avoiding Inferred required attribute when default value is defined #38801
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RadioButton Content squished on Android #3663

Created

Merged

Updated

  • [iOS, Windows] Implement Border properties in ImageButton #3641
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix warnings from #3519 #3656
    area/layout 🔲
  • WinUI3 Interop for share and file picker #3232
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1846 #2605

  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1760 #2763
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

    area/blazor 🕸️
